Log[l])/766086128640-(1423526912698421 Log[m])/766086128640-(1423526912698421 Log[\[Pi]])/766086128640-(1/766086128640)1423526912698421 (-Log[2]+3 Log[c]-Log[f]+Log[l]-Log[m]-Log[\[Pi]]+(3 Log[x])/2)+(1423526912698421 Log[\[Chi]])/766086128640))))
(* 3PN-accurate Fourier phase with e0^6 corrections in eccentricity where e0 = et(f0) is the eccentricity when the signal enters GW detector at f0. Note that this Fourier phase does not include the effect of periastron advance. *)
